hudson.tasks.Shell.command: aws eks --region eu-west-1 update-kubeconfig --name eks-Cap iam_role=`aws iam list-roles | grep eks-Cap-nodes | sed -n '4p' | cut -d '"' -f4` echo $iam_role #sed -i '8d' /home/ubuntu/aws-auth-cm.yaml #cd /home/ubuntu #ls #sed -i "8i// -rolearn: $iam_role" /home/ubuntu/aws-auth-cm.yaml sed "s/- rolearn:.*/- rolearn: $iam_role/" /home/ubuntu/aws-auth-cm.yaml #kubectl delete -f aws-auth-cm.yaml #kubectl create -f aws-auth-cm.yaml #kubectl get nodes
